verses.verse: [A psalme for to confesse.] Be ye ioyfull in God all that be in the earth:
(100:1) serue God with gladnesse, and come before his face with a ioyfull noyse.
(100:2) Be ye sure that God is the Lorde, it is he that hath made vs, and not we our selues: we are his people and the sheepe of his pasture.
(100:3) Go your way into his gates with thankesgeuyng, and into his courtes with prayse: be thankfull vnto hym [and] blesse his name.
(100:4) For God is gratious, his mercie is euerlastyng: and his trueth [endureth] from generation to generation.
